clinical_study.brief_title: KT on Low Back Pain Patients
clinical_study.official_title: The Influence of Kinesio Taping on Back Muscle Fatigue of Low Back Pain Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte

clinical_study.source: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte

brief_summary.textblock: This study aim evaluates the effect of Kinesio Taping (KT) on back muscle fatigue of low back pain patients, analysing the electromyography activity of longissimus muscle (median frequency) and the sustained time during a fatigue test (Ito test).

detailed_description.textblock: Individuals with low back pain usually have poor back muscles endurance, which may be improved with the application of Kinesio Taping. The aim of this study is evaluate the effect of Kinesio Taping on back muscle fatigue of low back pain patients. Sixty-four women, between 18 to 50 years old, with chronic nonspecific Low Back Pain will attend this study. They will be randomly assigned in four different groups: control group (CG), KT with tension group (KTT), KT no tension group (KTNT) and Micropore® group (MP) and submitted to three evaluations: pre, three and ten days after intervention, analysing the electromyography activity of longissimus muscle and the sustained time during a fatigue test. The variables analysed during the evaluations will be median frequency (MP) slope of longuissimus muscle and sustained time during the Ito test.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline median frequency at three days after the application of the tape.
primary_outcome.description: Median frequency slope measured my electromyography

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline median frequency at ten days after the application of the tape.
secondary_outcome.description: Median frequency slope measured my electromyography

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline sustained time at three days after the application of the tape.
secondary_outcome.description: Sustained time during a fatigue test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline sustained time at ten days after the application of the tape.
secondary_outcome.description: Sustained time during a fatigue test

arm_group.description: It will not apply any tape.
Apply the KT with tension in the erector spine muscles.
Apply the KT without tension in the erector spine muscles.
Apply Micropore tape in the erector spine muscles.

intervention.description: Application of Kinesio Taping with tension in the erector spine muscles.
Application of Kinesio Taping without tension in the erector spine muscles.
Application of Micropore tape in the erector spine muscles.

facility.name: Federal University of Rio Grande do Norte

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Norte
